title: Harden MuseScore detection and errors
description: find_musescore currently raises a NameError on unsupported platforms because it references `NotImplementedException` (Subito.py:270-285), and returns None on macOS when no MuseScore binary is present before we even need it. Guard for missing MuseScore earlier with a clear error message, use `NotImplementedError`, and consider allowing a user-provided path/override so simple MIDI-only runs do not die when MuseScore is absent.

title: Handle invalid part definitions without NameError
description: validPartDef currently references an undefined partStr when logging an invalid entry (Subito.py:109-131), so a bad PARTS entry in config triggers a NameError before the script can prompt or fallback. Replace the log variable so the offending definition is reported correctly and ensure invalid config data fails gracefully instead of crashing.

title: Allow nested output directories when mirroring source tree
description: When processing a directory, Subito.py builds `subdir = os.path.join(args.outpath, os.path.dirname(os.path.relpath(s, args.inpath)))` (around lines 503-506) and then calls `os.mkdir(subdir)`. This explodes for inputs in nested folders because intermediate directories are missing. Switch to `os.makedirs(..., exist_ok=True)` (or similar) so mirrored output paths are created reliably, including the empty string case from find.
